snippet.title: The Hardy Boys - The Hidden Theft Trailer
snippet.description:
JoWooD and DreamCatcher Games, leading worldwide publishers and distributors of interactive entertainment software, have released the official trailer for The Hardy Boys: The Hidden Theft, a highly-anticipated mystery adventure game shipping this September.

Fans can now view actual footage from the game, and check out the in-game likenesses of two of Hollywoods stars, Jesse McCartney (Frank Hardy) and Cody Linley (Joe Hardy).  Also featured in the trailer are glimpses into various locations in and around the boys hometown of Bayport.  Viewers with a keen eye for detail may even spot a few clues flash by too!
